verses.text: \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \add was\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w declined|strong="H5493"\w* \add neither\add* to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, nor to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

¶ For in the \w eighth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, while he was yet \w young|strong="H5288"\w*, he \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* after the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* he \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w purge|strong="H2891"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and the carved \w images|strong="H6456"\w*, and the molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w*.

And they brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w* in his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; and the \w images|strong="H2553"\w*, that \add were\add* on high above \w them|strong="H4605"\w*, he cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w*; and the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and the carved \w images|strong="H6456"\w*, and the molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w*, he brake in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, and made \w dust|strong="H1854"\w* \add of them\add*, and \w strowed|strong="H2236"\w* \add it\add* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* of them that had \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 34.4 \ft the images: or, the sun images\f*\f + \fr 34.4 \ft graves: Heb. face of the graves\f*

And he \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* upon their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And \add so did he\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, even unto \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, with their \w mattocks|strong="H2719"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 34.6 \ft mattocks: or, mauls\f*

And when he had broken \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* and the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and had \w beaten|strong="H3807"\w* the graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* into \w powder|strong="H1854"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w* all the \w idols|strong="H2553"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 34.7 \ft into…: Heb. to make powder\f*

¶ Now in the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, when he had \w purged|strong="H2891"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azaliah|strong="H0683"\w*, and \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w governor|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joahaz|strong="H3099"\w* the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*, to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, they \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w doors|strong="H5592"\w* had \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and of all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and of all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; and they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And they \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w workmen|strong="H6213"\w* that had the \w oversight|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it to the \w workmen|strong="H6213"\w* that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w repair|strong="H0918"\w* and \w amend|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

Even to the \w artificers|strong="H2796"\w* and \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* they \add it\add*, to \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w hewn|strong="H4274"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* for \w couplings|strong="H4226"\w*, and to \w floor|strong="H7136"\w* the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* which the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w*.\f + \fr 34.11 \ft to floor: or, to rafter\f*

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*: and the \w overseers|strong="H5329"\w* of them \add were\add* \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w* and \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, of the sons of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*, to set \add it\add* \w forward|strong="H6485"\w*; and \add other of\add* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, all that could \w skill|strong="H0995"\w* of \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w*.

Also \add they were\add* over the bearers of \w burdens|strong="H5449"\w*, and \add were\add* \w overseers|strong="H5329"\w* of all that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in any manner of \w service|strong="H5656"\w*: and of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add there were\add* \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, and \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*.

¶ And when they brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was brought \w into|strong="H0935"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add given\add* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.  +  r 34.14  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

And \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* to \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*.

And \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* again, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, All that was \w committed|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 34.16 \ft to thy…: Heb. to the hand of, etc\f*

And they have gathered \w together|strong="H5413"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* it into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w overseers|strong="H6485"\w*, and to the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w workmen|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 34.17 \ft gathered together: Heb. poured out, or, melted\f*

Then \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*. And \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 34.18 \ft it: Heb. in it\f*

And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, and \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, and \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 34.20 \ft Abdon: or, Achbor\f*

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for me, and for them that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, concerning the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* that is \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that is poured \w out|strong="H5413"\w* upon us, because our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

And \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, and \add they\add* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add had appointed\add*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Huldah|strong="H2468"\w* the \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tikvath|strong="H8616"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hasrah|strong="H2641"\w*, \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w wardrobe|strong="H0899"\w*; (now she \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w college|strong="H4932"\w*:) and they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to her to that \add effect\add*.\f + \fr 34.22 \ft Hasrah: also called, Harhas\f*\f + \fr 34.22 \ft wardrobe: Heb. garments\f*\f + \fr 34.22 \ft in the college: or, in the school, or, in the second part\f*

¶ And she \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* ye the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you to me,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, \add even\add* all the \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* that are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* which they have \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*:

Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, that they might provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; therefore my \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* shall be poured \w out|strong="H5413"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.

And as \w for|strong="H0413"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, who \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, so shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add concerning\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*;

Because thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was \w tender|strong="H7401"\w*, and thou didst \w humble|strong="H3665"\w* thyself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, when thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w* against this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, and \w humbledst|strong="H3665"\w* thyself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, and didst \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* thy \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me; I have even \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add thee\add* also, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, I will \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* thee to thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and thou shalt be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* to thy \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, neither shall thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the same. So they \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w small|strong="H6996"\w*: and he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 34.30  t great…: Heb. from great even to small *

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in his \w place|strong="H5977"\w*, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and his \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, and his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

And he caused all that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \add to it\add*. And the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 34.32 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

And \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* took \w away|strong="H5493"\w* all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* out of all the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* that \add pertained\add* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and made all that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, \add even\add* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \add And\add* all his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* they \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.  +  r 34.33  t present: Heb. found *  +  r 34.33  t from…: Heb. from after *
